about_the_game:
Inspired by the Half-Life series, Estranged: Arctic Cold follows the story of a fisherman stranded in a mysterious Arctic facility. Experience the rich environments and captivating storytelling as you venture deeper into the facility.

A standalone sequel to Estranged: Act I (2014) and Estranged: The Departure (2020) continues the story of a shipwrecked fisherman, uncovering the secretive Arque Corporation, burrowing ever deeper into their dangerous and haphazard operations in the Arctic Cold.

Product Features
  • Original single player experience: Inspired by the Half-Life series, the game features an interactive world with player physics interaction.
  • Intriguing story: An original story featuring a captivating world and absorbing characters.
  • Unfinished sequel: A standalone sequel to The Departure, which also gained new content via periodic updates incorporating community feedback until it was finished.

This game is developed by one person in their spare time, with help from a community of translators and testers. It is a standalone sequel to Estranged: The Departure (2020) which followed our hero's adventure in a search for a way to get home.

content_descriptors.notes: Estranged features blood and violence with mild horror elements.
